settings.contact_text_desc: Have a question or comment? Please use the form below to send us a message. We promise to respond to you as quickly as possible!
settings.location_code:
Please get in touch!

We would love to hear from you - please use the form to send us your message, or contact us directly at:

Email: customercare@localthreads.com.au

Phone: 03 8692 8369

Address: 13 Eugenia St, Nunawading, Vic

ARE YOU A DESIGNER OR BRAND THAT WANTS TO BE FEATURED ON LOCAL THREADS?

Please send through your businesses details and show us your best fashion to be featured!

Email: claire@localthreads.com.au

settings.question_faqs: What is the Local Threads return/exchange policy?
settings.answer_faqs:
Local Threads is committed to your 100% satisfaction and aims to always provide you with the latest fashion that are of the highest quality! If you are not satisfied with your purchase for any reason, simply return it within 7 days of receiving your order for a hassle-free refund. Exclusions include all jewellery, swimwear, underwear and non-returnable items unless deemed faulty. Any non-returnable product will be clearly identified in its product description.

For more information with specific instructions, please visit: www.localthreads.com.au/pages/return-policy

Local Threads strives to keep shipping costs as low and fast as possible for you. We are committed to this so that you can enjoy your purchase as soon as possible at the most affordable price. Local Threads uses Australia Post as our standard courier. Each order may take between 3-7 days for Australian orders, or 12-21 days if shipping internationally, unless otherwise stated on the product. For example, some designers custom make their orders to ensure the item is perfect for you! We have live tracking on all orders!

settings.question_faqs: Where are Local Threads clothes from?
settings.answer_faqs: Local Threads is a marketplace for the best clothing and accessories from Australian Independent designers. We ensure all items are fashionable, independant, unique, Australian and ethical.

settings.question_faqs: Will the items I ordered arrive together?
settings.answer_faqs: Please note that if you order multiple items from different brands then your order may arrive in seperate packages. This is because the Local Threads brands and designers send their items directly to you to speed up delivery times and minimise our environmental impact! All items in your order will arrive around the same time period and there will be no extra cost for you!

Local Threads extends our social responsibility by ensuring that all featured brands & designers adhere to our ethical requirements. If it is not ethical, then we will not sell it! Read more about the strides we are taking to promote ethical practice at: https://localthreads.com.au/pages/about-us

settings.question_faqs: How do I track my order if I did not receive a shipping code?
settings.answer_faqs: If you did not receive a shipping code to track your order then please let us know at contact@localthreads.com.au. We will promptly let you know the expected arrival date of your order/s.

settings.question_faqs: Does Local Threads accept Afterpay? What payment types do you accept?
settings.answer_faqs: Local Threads accepts Afterpay,  Paypal, Apple Pay and all traditional card payments such as VISA and Mastercard.

settings.question_faqs: How do I use my refund discount coupon or referral code?
settings.answer_faqs: When you are ready to order and use your code, please go to your cart by clicking the shopping cart icon in the top right hand corner of the website. Once in your cart, click 'Proceed To Checkout'. Then, insert any refund discount coupons or referral codes in the 'discount code' box and click 'apply' to activate the code. These codes are for a one time use only. To read more information, please visit: www.localthreads.com.au/pages/return-policy

Shipping is free for any delivery within Australia when spending over $99! A standard $9.95 shipping rate applies for orders under $99 within Australia.

International orders will be charged the standard delivery rate based on the item/s weight. All deliveries have free returns, exchanges and live tracking!

settings.question_faqs: How do I change my delivery address after purchasing an item?
settings.answer_faqs:
Please email customercare@localthreads.com.au immediately and we will do everything we can to change your shipping address.

If you have not ordered and want to update your delivery address, then you can do so in your account settings by logging into "My Account" at the top of the website.

settings.question_faqs: The item I want is out of stock. What now?
settings.answer_faqs: We apologise for the inconvenience! The Local Threads emerging designers and brands often have exclusive item runs with limited stock availability. If you would like to know when a particular item will be restocked, simply send an email to customercare@localthreads.com.au asking and we will let you know!
Yes we ship worldwide! You will be notified at checkout if we are not able to ship to your desired destination.

settings.question_faqs: How do I update my account details?
settings.answer_faqs: Please click on 'My Account' at the top of the website, then log in and follow the prompts to update your details. This will allow you to update the name of your account, change your address or add another address. If you are still having issues, please contact customercare@localthreads.com.au and they can assist you with your inquiry.

settings.question_faqs: How can I track my order?
settings.answer_faqs: All orders with Local Threads will receive an order confirmation of when an item has been shipped. A tracking number will be provided in this email. Please click on this tracking number to stay updated with its progress (it will take you to the relevant courier page). If you have any issues finding your tracking code then please email: contact@localthreads.com.au
All prices on our website are AUD. However, if you're ordering from overseas you can pay in your currency. This change in currency will take place at checkout.

settings.des_faqs: Local Threads prides itself on giving you the best customer experience possible! If you have any questions or concerns which are unanswered below, then please ask our customer support team at  customercare@localthreads.com.au!

settings.shipping_returns_content:
Returns Policy

Local Threads is committed to your 100% satisfaction and aims to always provide you with the latest fashion that are of the highest quality! If your purchase is not delivered as described or if it does not quite fit, simply return the item/s within 7 days of receiving your order for a hassle-free refund. Exclusions include all jewellery, swimwear, underwear and non-returnable items unless deemed faulty. To best support our local brands, returns for change of mind decisions and sale items are not permitted.

For more information with specific instructions, please visit: www.localthreads.com.au/pages/return-policy

Local Threads is a proudly Australian company and only offer local shipping.

  • Free Shipping on All Orders
  • Live order tracking and updates
  • Free returns and exchanges**
  • Delivered within 3-7 days (unless otherwise stated in product description)

If you order multiple items from different brands, then your order will arrive in seperate packages as they will be sent directly from the brand to reduce the delivery time and our environmental footprint!

For more information, please visit: www.localthreads.com.au/pages/shipping-information
settings.custom_tab_content:
Local Threads guarantees that you will not find our products cheaper anywhere else! We will price match any lower retail price to ensure you are getting the cheapest offer around! *T's & C's Apply* Local Threads also strives to keep shipping costs as minimal as possible for you! All our products are sent directly from the brands to lower shipping costs and limit our environmental impact!

Wearing Local Matters.

settings.title: Lifeline Australia
settings.des: Lifeline provides free, 24-hour Telephone Crisis Support service in Australia. Volunteer Crisis Supporters provide suicide prevention services, mental health support and emotional assistance.

settings.title: Country Fire Authority
settings.des: CFA  is a volunteer and community based fire and emergency services organisation. They help protect 3.3 million Victorians, and more than one million homes and properties across the state.

settings.title: RSPCA Australia
settings.des: RSPCA Australia is an Australian charity established in 1981 to promote animal welfare. Their mission is to provide services to animals in need through their shelters and inspectorates.

settings.spotlight_block_des:
Local Threads has teamed up with the below Australian charities so that together, we can make our local community a better place! The selected charities save, change and improve live for thousands every year - so the least we can do as a community is give back! "Local Matters" is also about directly supporting talented Australian independent brands and designers that are promoted worldwide through Local Threads

Each Purchase = $1 Donated
